column4: does anybody know a utility i could use for converting oggs to mp3s?
oggdec and lame from the command line
i've found plenty that do it from mp3s and others to oggs. i've already done it with a bash script but i'm not happy with my solution as I don't get the id3 tags to the newly created mp3s
naibed, been there, done that. i'm really looking for something more refined than that :)
